tips.title: Tip
tips.step1: Fill in the title and description fields in detail. This ensures your listing gets more views.
tips.step2: Enter your property's features completely. Area information should be in square meters.
tips.step3: Mark all the features your property has. This attracts potential buyers' interest.
tips.step4: Enter location information as detailed as possible. You can also mark on the map.
tips.step5: Specify important details like deed status and usage information.
tips.step6: You can set listing validity dates. If left blank, it will be indefinite.
tips.step7: Upload at least 3, at most 20 photos. The first photo will be the cover photo.
tips.editStep1: When title and description are updated, your listing may attract more interest.
tips.editStep2: By keeping price and area information up to date, you can get more views.
tips.editStep3: Newly added features can increase your listing's value.
tips.editStep4: Make sure location information is correct.
tips.editStep5: Additional information is very important for potential buyers.
tips.editStep6: By updating date information, you can keep your listing active.
tips.editStep7: You can make your listing more attractive by adding new photos.
